text: he eemaan vaalo! aisee bahut see cheezon ke vishay mein prashn na karo, jo yadi tumhen bata dee jaayen, to tumhen bura lag jaaye tatha yadi tum, unake vishay mein, jabaki quraan utar raha hai, prashn karoge, to vo tumhaare lie khol dee jaayengee. allaah ne tumhen kshama kar diya aur allaah ati kshamaasheel sahanasheel[1] hai
